headline: Expand Energy: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — Expand Energy Corporation (EXE) on Tuesday reported second-quarter earnings of $968 million. On a per-share basis, the Oklahoma City-based company said it had net income of $4.02. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were $1.10 per share.

headline: Expand Energy Corporation Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, July 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: EXE) (“Expand Energy” or the “Company”) today reported second quarter 2025 financial and operating results. Net cash provided by operating activities of $1,322 millionNet income of $968 million, or $4.02 per fully diluted share; adjusted net income(1) of $265 million, or $1.10 per shareAdjusted EBITDAX(1) of $1,176 millionProduced ~7.20 Bcfe/d net (92% natural gas)Delivered the highest average drilled footage per

content.title: Expand Energy Corporation Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
content.summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, July 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: EXE) (“Expand Energy” or the “Company”) today reported second quarter 2025 financial and operating results.
